hero.title: About Our Restaurant
hero.subtitle: Discover our story and meet the team behind the flavors.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Opened in 2025 with chefs with many years of experience Our mission is to create memorable dining experiences that bring people together, celebrating the rich culinary traditions of our region while innovating with modern techniques.
story.p2: From humble beginnings as a small family-owned eatery, we've grown into a beloved destination, committed to sustainability, local sourcing, and fostering a welcoming atmosphere for all our guests.

members.name: Doeun Sophat
members.description: With over 5 years of experience, Sophat crafts our signature dishes with creativity and precision.

members.name: Mrr. Phou
members.description: Service and delivery to our customer.
